name: mbedtls-static
description: mbedtls-static is a static library for Mbed TLS, a lightweight and portable cryptographic and SSL/TLS library.
usage: After installing mbedtls-static, you can link it with your applications for cryptographic functionalities.
features: Lightweight: Designed to be lightweight and portable.
Static Library: Can be statically linked with applications.
Cryptographic Support: Provides cryptographic algorithms and SSL/TLS protocols.
additional_resources: You can find more information, updates, and community discussions on the official website.

community_and_support.forums: Check out forums and communities dedicated to cryptography and SSL/TLS for support and discussions.
